creator: Orange Polska
descriptionHtml:
It was supposed to be fast, comfy and available in one app. Ta-dah, and there it is!

Why is it so good to be in Orange Flex?
Simplicity. Register. Transfer your number or add a new one. Install an e-SIM or order a traditional SIM card. And you're done here.
Immensity. You get unlimited voice calls, SMS and MMS in Poland and in the EU. Choose as many GB per month as you need. Apart from that you get Social Pass, so your GB aren't used on social media (TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber, Pinterest and Twitter).
Flexibility. Bump up, cut back, enable and disable your monthly Plan whenever you want with no additional fees.
Freedom. In Orange Flex there're no commitments, contracts, paperwork, store visits nor matters of routine.
Control. Add a card and forget about money transfers or top-ups. You make your decisions in advance, so there won't be any spooky surprise neither with additional fees nor with a phone bill upon your return from vacation.
Still not enough?
Video Pass – binge-watch like there's no tomorrow! Watch films and series via popular apps and websites, and don't worry about your GB (HBO GO, Netflix, YouTube, Orange TV GO and VOD.pl).
Music Pass – listen to songs, radio and podcasts without shrinking your GB pack. It's the neverending stooory with Tidal, Apple Music, Deezer, Amazon Music and Polskie Radio.
You're the one who decides. Choose and enable packs. Additional GB. Roaming. International voice calls. Music and video passes. Whatever you want.
And there's a chat, you know? We're available 24/7. Along with a whole team of advisors.
Cool!
And that's just the beginning. We've got a whole bunch of novelties to be presented soon. We're listening to you carefully, 'cause you're the one who's Flex!
Wanna join? Take these 5 steps to become Flex:
#1 Download the app, set your account and choose your Plan
#2 Transfer your number or select a new one
#3 Get your SIM delivered by a courier for free or pick it up in our store. How about getting an eSIM?
#4 Take a picture of a selected ID document and take a selfie to confirm your identity. PS We don't store your photos!
#5 Add a debit card or pay with BLIK, it's that simple!
descriptionShort: Mobile Plan in the app. Go for it if you want. Let it go if you don't.

Flex learns new things. Constantly. From now on, the app can speak in three languages, Polish, English, and Ukrainian (some parts so far)! You can find the option to change it in Settings.
Are you reactivating your Plan? From now on, you can choose whatever you want.
P.S. eSIM bugs? Not anymore!
---

title: Orange Flex

creator: Orange Polska
descriptionHtml:
It was supposed to be fast, comfy and available in one app. Ta-dah, and there it is!

Why is it so good to be in Orange Flex?
Simplicity. Register. Transfer your number or add a new one. Install an e-SIM or order a traditional SIM card. And you're done here.
Immensity. You get unlimited voice calls, SMS and MMS in Poland and in the EU. Choose as many GB per month as you need. Apart from that you get Social Pass, so your GB aren't used on social media (TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber, Pinterest and Twitter).
Flexibility. Bump up, cut back, enable and disable your monthly Plan whenever you want with no additional fees.
Freedom. In Orange Flex there're no commitments, contracts, paperwork, store visits nor matters of routine.
Control. Add a card and forget about money transfers or top-ups. You make your decisions in advance, so there won't be any spooky surprise neither with additional fees nor with a phone bill upon your return from vacation.
Still not enough?
Video Pass – binge-watch like there's no tomorrow! Watch films and series via popular apps and websites, and don't worry about your GB (HBO GO, Netflix, YouTube, Orange TV GO and VOD.pl).
Music Pass – listen to songs, radio and podcasts without shrinking your GB pack. It's the neverending stooory with Tidal, Apple Music, Deezer, Amazon Music and Polskie Radio.
You're the one who decides. Choose and enable packs. Additional GB. Roaming. International voice calls. Music and video passes. Whatever you want.
And there's a chat, you know? We're available 24/7. Along with a whole team of advisors.
Cool!
And that's just the beginning. We've got a whole bunch of novelties to be presented soon. We're listening to you carefully, 'cause you're the one who's Flex!
Wanna join? Take these 5 steps to become Flex:
#1 Download the app, set your account and choose your Plan
#2 Transfer your number or select a new one
#3 Get your SIM delivered by a courier for free or pick it up in our store. How about getting an eSIM?
#4 Take a picture of a selected ID document and take a selfie to confirm your identity. PS We don't store your photos!
#5 Add a debit card or pay with BLIK, it's that simple!
descriptionShort: Mobile Plan in the app. Go for it if you want. Let it go if you don't.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
"Invite and earn" – new rules, new program, more benefits for you. Become a master of recommendations. Share your code and earn 70 PLN. Your friend will receive 30 PLN. One more thing! Additionally, you can can receive 1000 GB! So, you know what to do. Recommend and earn. Cha-ching!

What’s up? Two things:

- Our new weight: 45 MB #miraclediet
- The app feels much more stable.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Let's plant our own forest!

Do you have spare data allowance? Then let's plant a forest together!

The rules are simple: every 30 GB = 1 m2 of forest. Together, we can plant as much as 10,000 m2 of forest in Męcikał in Kashubia. Back in 2017, a hurricane destroyed the surrounding forest areas. The view is out of this world. And that's where we want to plant a new, biodiverse and strong forest in spring!

Update and plant!

Music Pass – listen to songs, radio and podcasts without shrinking your GB pack. It's the neverending stooory with Tidal, Apple Music, Deezer, Amazon Music and Polskie Radio.
You're the one who decides. Choose and enable packs. Additional GB. Roaming. International voice calls. Music and video passes. Whatever you want.
And there's a chat, you know? We're available 24/7. Along with a whole team of advisors.
Cool!
And that's just the beginning. We've got a whole bunch of novelties to be presented soon. We're listening to you carefully, 'cause you're the one who's Flex!
Wanna join? Take these 5 steps to become Flex:
#1 Download the app, set your account and choose your Plan
#2 Transfer your number or select a new one
#3 Get your SIM delivered by a courier for free or pick it up in our store. How about getting an eSIM?
#4 Take a picture of a selected ID document and take a selfie to confirm your identity. PS We don't store your photos!
#5 Add a debit card or pay with BLIK, it's that simple!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
From the series "Morning talks with Flex developers”:
- What's about this update?
- We've been working on performance.
- OK, something more?
- Everything. It's supposed to be faster, especially after starting it.
- No freeze?
- No freeze. And one more thing, Video Pass has new partners!
- Canal+, Player, Ipla, CDA... Great, we'll describe it somehow, thanks.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Do you have Flex and you want to change your account to Flex for Business? Or Flex for You? Now you can!

A few clicks and... nothing will change, only invoices for Flex payments will come to your e-mail.

We also worked with the Flex Store, but only with code and optimization, so nothing interesting.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New update? Why not.
But… How to describe all of these changes when you ask developers and they answer you:
- Trifles.
- Bug fixing.

- Correct access to invoices for Flex for Business accounts.

Freedom. In Orange Flex there're no commitments, contracts, paperwork, store visits nor matters of routine.

Control. Add a card and forget about money transfers or top-ups. You make your decisions in advance, so there won't be any spooky surprise neither with additional fees nor with a phone bill upon your return from vacation.

Still not enough?
Video Pass – binge-watch like there's no tomorrow! Watch films and series via popular apps and websites, and don't worry about your GB (HBO GO, Netflix, YouTube, Orange TV GO and VOD.pl).
Music Pass – listen to songs, radio and podcasts without shrinking your GB pack. It's the neverending stooory with Tidal, Apple Music, Deezer, Amazon Music and Polskie Radio.
You're the one who decides. Choose and enable packs. Additional GB. Roaming. International voice calls. Music and video passes. Whatever you want.

And there's a chat, you know? We're available 24/7. Along with a whole team of advisors.
Cool!

And that's just the beginning. We've got a whole bunch of novelties to be presented soon. We're listening to you carefully, 'cause you're the one who's Flex!

Wanna join? Take these 5 steps to become Flex:
#1 Download the app, set your account and choose your Plan
#2 Transfer your number or select a new one
#3 Get your SIM delivered by a courier for free or pick it up in our store. How about getting an eSIM?
#4 Take a picture of a selected ID document and take a selfie to confirm your identity. PS We don't store your photos!
#5 Add a debit card or pay with BLIK, it's that simple!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The trees have been planted, but let’s not forget about our own yard:
- who hasn’t seen it yet, we refreshed the layout in the Flex Club and the generated codes do not get tangled on the list of promotions, but are in their place
- when reactivating the Plan, we added an additional message to let you know what's going on
- a bank account number for returns – you can type it in a well-known format That's it for a good start to the week!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The years go by, so we blow off the candles and celebrate for the whole week!
We’re partying indeed, but the changes won’t happen on their own . So let’s do it…
- the logos in the Flex Club are already clicking without freezing
- apparently you could order an unavailable product in the Flex Store ... nonsense, so it’s corrected!
- we improved the banner for those who ordered the suspension of the Plan PS. Here and there, we’ve hidden some birthday surprises. The clues are in the app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Let's smell something out as we have a few fixes:
- we have unified the statuses for orders from the store
- the GB transfer icon returns to its previous appearance for now

Let’s update!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's going on this time?  
Besides the usual fixes? It is all about the Game Pass!
What’s new?
World of Tanks Blitz!
<3 Tanks! Please, remind me – how does it work?
Game Pass gives you unlimited Internet while using: Twitch, Discord, Pokémon GO, Harry Potter, Wizards Unite, Clash Royale, and World of Tanks Blitz.
:raised_hands: Let’s play!

Flexibility. Bump up, cut back, enable and disable your monthly Plan whenever you want with no additional fees.

Freedom. In Orange Flex there're no commitments, contracts, paperwork, store visits nor matters of routine.

Control. Add a card and forget about money transfers or top-ups. You make your decisions in advance, so there won't be any spooky surprise neither with additional fees nor with a phone bill upon your return from vacation.

Still not enough?
Video Pass – binge-watch like there's no tomorrow! Watch films and series via popular apps and websites, and don't worry about your GB (HBO GO, Netflix, YouTube, Orange TV GO and VOD.pl).
Music Pass – listen to songs, radio and podcasts without shrinking your GB pack. It's the neverending stooory with Tidal, Apple Music, Deezer, Amazon Music and Polskie Radio.
You're the one who decides. Choose and enable packs. Additional GB. Roaming. International voice calls. Music and video passes. Whatever you want.

And there's a chat, you know? We're available 24/7. Along with a whole team of advisors.
Cool!

And that's just the beginning. We've got a whole bunch of novelties to be presented soon. We're listening to you carefully, 'cause you're the one who's Flex!

Wanna join? Take these 5 steps to become Flex:
#1 Download the app, set your account and choose your Plan
#2 Transfer your number or select a new one
#3 Get your SIM delivered by a courier for free or pick it up in our store. How about getting an eSIM?
#4 Take a picture of a selected ID document and take a selfie to confirm your identity. PS We don't store your photos!
#5 Add a debit card or pay with BLIK, it's that simple!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Let's plant a beautiful forest together!
Do you have free GB? Let's plant a biodiverse forest together. For us and for future generations.
The rule is simple – every 30 GB means 1 m2 of forest. Go green!

P.S. Hello United Kingdom, hello Gibraltar, we have new roaming packages from October 1!

#4 Take a picture of a selected ID document and take a selfie to confirm your identity. PS We don't store your photos!
#5 Add a debit card or pay with BLIK, it's that simple!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Dark, darker, dark mode! Have fun using Flex anytime. And let’s celebrate our birthday!
On top of that, we've added a new way to confirm identity for new users.
Selfie or logging in to the bank – simple, safe, everything in the app.

title: Orange Flex

creator: Orange Polska
descriptionHtml:
It was supposed to be fast, comfy and available in one app.
Ta-dah, and there it is!

Why is it so good to be in Orange Flex?

Simplicity. Register. Transfer your number or add a new one. Install an e-SIM or order a traditional SIM card. And you're done here.

Immensity. You get unlimited voice calls, SMS and MMS in Poland and in the EU. Choose as many GB per month as you need. Apart from that you get Social Pass, so your GB aren't used on social media (TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber, Pinterest and Twitter).

Flexibility. Bump up, cut back, enable and disable your monthly Plan whenever you want with no additional fees.

Freedom. In Orange Flex there're no commitments, contracts, paperwork, store visits nor matters of routine.

Control. Add a card and forget about money transfers or top-ups. You make your decisions in advance, so there won't be any spooky surprise neither with additional fees nor with a phone bill upon your return from vacation.

Still not enough?
Video Pass – binge-watch like there's no tomorrow! Watch films and series via popular apps and websites, and don't worry about your GB (HBO GO, Netflix, YouTube, Orange TV GO and VOD.pl).
Music Pass – listen to songs, radio and podcasts without shrinking your GB pack. It's the neverending stooory with Tidal, Apple Music, Deezer, Amazon Music and Polskie Radio.
You're the one who decides. Choose and enable packs. Additional GB. Roaming. International voice calls. Music and video passes. Whatever you want.

And there's a chat, you know? We're available 24/7. Along with a whole team of advisors.
Cool!

And that's just the beginning. We've got a whole bunch of novelties to be presented soon. We're listening to you carefully, 'cause you're the one who's Flex!

Wanna join? Take these 5 steps to become Flex:
#1 Download the app, set your account and choose your Plan
#2 Transfer your number or select a new one
#3 Get your SIM delivered by a courier for free or pick it up in our store. How about getting an eSIM?
#4 Take a picture of a selected ID document and take a selfie to confirm your identity. PS We don't store your photos!
#5 Add a debit card or pay with BLIK, it's that simple!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Small and annoying.
Do you know this type? We know, for sure. Fortunately, all the bugs, even the smallest ones, are gone. Happy to share the newest update!
Have a nice day!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Two novelties. It's hard to decide which one is more interesting.
1. Depending on your current Plan, you can order up to 3 additional SIM or eSIM cards for free. How many? Check your Plan in the app!
2. You don't have to send GB manually. Set up a recurring GB transfer for your loved ones! When, how much, for who – it's your choice!

It was supposed to be fast, comfy and available in one app.
Ta-dah, and there it is!

Why is it so good to be in Orange Flex?

Simplicity. Register. Transfer your number or add a new one. Install an e-SIM or order a traditional SIM card. And you're done here.

Immensity. You get unlimited voice calls, SMS and MMS in Poland and in the EU. Choose as many GB per month as you need. Apart from that you get Social Pass, so your GB aren't used on social media (TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber, Pinterest and Twitter).

Flexibility. Bump up, cut back, enable and disable your monthly Plan whenever you want with no additional fees.

Freedom. In Orange Flex there're no commitments, contracts, paperwork, store visits nor matters of routine.

Control. Add a card and forget about money transfers or top-ups. You make your decisions in advance, so there won't be any spooky surprise neither with additional fees nor with a phone bill upon your return from vacation.

Still not enough?
Video Pass – binge-watch like there's no tomorrow! Watch films and series via popular apps and websites, and don't worry about your GB (HBO GO, Netflix, YouTube, Orange TV GO and VOD.pl).
Music Pass – listen to songs, radio and podcasts without shrinking your GB pack. It's the neverending stooory with Tidal, Apple Music, Deezer, Amazon Music and Polskie Radio.
You're the one who decides. Choose and enable packs. Additional GB. Roaming. International voice calls. Music and video passes. Whatever you want.

And there's a chat, you know? We're available 24/7. Along with a whole team of advisors.
Cool!

And that's just the beginning. We've got a whole bunch of novelties to be presented soon. We're listening to you carefully, 'cause you're the one who's Flex!

Wanna join? Take these 5 steps to become Flex:
#1 Download the app, set your account and choose your Plan
#2 Transfer your number or select a new one
#3 Get your SIM delivered by a courier for free or pick it up in our store. How about getting an eSIM?
#4 Take a picture of a selected ID document and take a selfie to confirm your identity. PS We don't store your photos!
#5 Add a debit card or pay with BLIK, it's that simple!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What did we do this time?

Fixing some tiny bugs we really don’t like.
Adding some performance improvements.
And some minor changes – very technical, but not interesting.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This is one of those updates worth waiting for.

Therefore, without waiting, let’s sum up:

- From now on, you can buy in the Flex Shop and choose InPost delivery. Yay!

- We have added new EU roaming packages. More, better, simpler.

- And, as always: minor bug fixes. Less spectacular, but equally important.


Have a good day!

title: Orange Flex

creator: Orange Polska
descriptionHtml:
It was supposed to be fast, comfy and available in one app.
Ta-dah, and there it is!

Why is it so good to be in Orange Flex?

Simplicity. Register. Transfer your number or add a new one. Install an e-SIM or order a traditional SIM card. And you're done here.

Immensity. You get unlimited voice calls, SMS and MMS in Poland and in the EU. Choose as many GB per month as you need. Apart from that you get Social Pass, so your GB aren't used on social media (TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber, Pinterest and Twitter).

Flexibility. Bump up, cut back, enable and disable your monthly Plan whenever you want with no additional fees.

Freedom. In Orange Flex there're no commitments, contracts, paperwork, store visits nor matters of routine.

Control. Add a card and forget about money transfers or top-ups. You make your decisions in advance, so there won't be any spooky surprise neither with additional fees nor with a phone bill upon your return from vacation.

Still not enough?
Video Pass – binge-watch like there's no tomorrow! Watch films and series via popular apps and websites, and don't worry about your GB (HBO GO, Netflix, YouTube, Orange TV GO and VOD.pl).
Music Pass – listen to songs, radio and podcasts without shrinking your GB pack. It's the neverending stooory with Tidal, Apple Music, Deezer, Amazon Music and Polskie Radio.
You're the one who decides. Choose and enable packs. Additional GB. Roaming. International voice calls. Music and video passes. Whatever you want.

And there's a chat, you know? We're available 24/7. Along with a whole team of advisors.
Cool!

Immensity. You get unlimited voice calls, SMS and MMS in Poland and in the EU. Choose as many GB per month as you need. Apart from that you get Social Pass, so your GB aren't used on social media (TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber, Pinterest and Twitter).

Flexibility. Bump up, cut back, enable and disable your monthly Plan whenever you want with no additional fees.

Freedom. In Orange Flex there're no commitments, contracts, paperwork, store visits nor matters of routine.

Control. Add a card and forget about money transfers or top-ups. You make your decisions in advance, so there won't be any spooky surprise neither with additional fees nor with a phone bill upon your return from vacation.

Still not enough?
Video Pass – binge-watch like there's no tomorrow! Watch films and series via popular apps and websites, and don't worry about your GB (HBO GO, Netflix, YouTube, Orange TV GO and VOD.pl).
Music Pass – listen to songs, radio and podcasts without shrinking your GB pack. It's the neverending stooory with Tidal, Apple Music, Deezer, Amazon Music and Polskie Radio.
You're the one who decides. Choose and enable packs. Additional GB. Roaming. International voice calls. Music and video passes. Whatever you want.

And there's a chat, you know? We're available 24/7. Along with a whole team of advisors.
Cool!

And that's just the beginning. We've got a whole bunch of novelties to be presented soon. We're listening to you carefully, 'cause you're the one who's Flex!

Wanna join? Take these 5 steps to become Flex:
#1 Download the app, set your account and choose your Plan
#2 Transfer your number or select a new one
#3 Get your SIM delivered by a courier for free or pick it up in our store. How about getting an eSIM?
#4 Take a picture of a selected ID document and take a selfie to confirm your identity. PS We don't store your photos!
#5 Add a debit card or pay with BLIK, it's that simple!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This update is much better than the previous one, although not as good as the next one!

title: Orange Flex

creator: Orange Polska
descriptionHtml:
Orange Flex is an in-app mobile offer. More flexible than a standard subscription, easier than a prepaid plan. It's easy to transfer your number and you can change your Plan whenever you need to – even once a month. Forget about long contracts and notice periods! Plus you get data and unlimited calls, 5G and eSIM.

WHY IS IT GREAT TO BE IN ORANGE FLEX?
EASY. You sign up. You transfer your number or get a new one. You install an eSIM or order a traditional SIM card. All in the app, without calling or leaving your home.
LOTS OF EVERYTHING. You get unlimited calls, SMS and MMS in Poland and in the EU. You choose how much data you need per month. Plus you get Social Pass, so you can scroll through TikTok, Instagram and other social media and use messaging apps like WhatsApp and Messenger without using up data from the Plan.
AND MORE. Still not enough? In Orange Flex, you can increase your data limit. All you have to do is activate our UNLMTD offer – unlimited data packages for 7 or 30 days. Perfect for digital ninjas who can't live without the internet.
Oh, and you can choose 1, 2 or 3 additional SIM cards or eSIMs for free with your Plan. We figured that it's nice to have for a smartwatch, tablet or second phone. But with UNLMTD you can get unlimited internet at home, for a life free of cables and long contracts.
FLEXIBLE. You can upgrade, downgrade, activate and deactivate your monthly Plan whenever you want and with no extra charge. You can set everything up once and subscribe that way, or change your mind every month. Finally, a mobile offer that keeps up with the changes in your life.
FREEDOM. In Orange Flex, there are no long-term contracts, paperwork, trips to the store or other unnecessary formalities. Who would want to play that game now we've invented the subscription?
SOCIAL. An in-app mobile network offers lots of opportunities – and we didn't hesitate to use them! That's how we came up with one of our users' favourite services: data transfer. You can either send some much-needed internet to friends who are also in Flex, or accept some as a gift from them.
EVERYTHING UNDER CONTROL. Link your card and forget about transfers and top-ups once and for all. You can also pay with BLIK. You decide what packages to buy and when, and you can track your data usage any time in the app. No more high bills after holidays.
FAST AND 5G. You get 5G in all of the Plans on Orange Flex. Plus you can choose an eSIM so you don't have to wait for the courier or mess around with inserting the card into the device. You join the network digitally and eSIM activation takes seconds. If your smartphone supports eSIM, hop on over to Flex – we have the easiest activation (but you're more than welcome to join us with a regular SIM too).
24/7 SUPPORT. The Flex app is super easy and intuitive. But if you need some help, our chat is always available. It's open 24 hours a day.
THERE'S MORE?
There sure is! The core elements of the Orange Flex mobile offer are just the start of the fun. Once you've joined the Flex community, you can:
- buy smartphones, smartwatches and other devices in the Flex Store – we have regular promos here, sometimes really huge ones,
- enjoy discounts in the Flex Club,
- get paid for recommending Flex to friends.

Last but not least – Orange Flex is the first climate-neutral telecom service in Poland. It's powered by green wind energy, and we've gone paperless and cut down on plastic. And every once in a while, we plant forests with our users!

5 STEPS AND YOU'RE ON FLEX:
#1 Download the app and choose your Plan.
#2 Create an account and transfer your number or choose a new one.
#3 Choose an e-SIM or a SIM card (with collection in store or courier delivery).
#4 Confirm your identity – with a selfie and a photo of your ID document or the My ID option via your bank. P.S. We don't store your photos.
#5 Choose whether you want to pay by card or BLIK, then activate your number.

And that's it – enjoy and invite your friends!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
TL;DR – unlimited internet, new app design

What's new?

A lot! Let’s welcome the UNLMTD – truly unlimited internet that you can turn on for 7 or 30 days. On this occasion, we renewed the main screen of the application with a new design. Take a look!

If your smartphone supports eSIM, hop on over to Flex – we have the easiest activation (but you're more than welcome to join us with a regular SIM too).
24/7 SUPPORT. The Flex app is super easy and intuitive. But if you need some help, our chat is always available. It's open 24 hours a day.
THERE'S MORE?
There sure is! The core elements of the Orange Flex mobile offer are just the start of the fun. Once you've joined the Flex community, you can:
- buy smartphones, smartwatches and other devices in the Flex Store – we have regular promos here, sometimes really huge ones,
- enjoy discounts in the Flex Club,
- get paid for recommending Flex to friends.

Last but not least – Orange Flex is the first climate-neutral telecom service in Poland. It's powered by green wind energy, and we've gone paperless and cut down on plastic. And every once in a while, we plant forests with our users!

5 STEPS AND YOU'RE ON FLEX:
#1 Download the app and choose your Plan.
#2 Create an account and transfer your number or choose a new one.
#3 Choose an e-SIM or a SIM card (with collection in store or courier delivery).
#4 Confirm your identity – with a selfie and a photo of your ID document or the My ID option via your bank. P.S. We don't store your photos.
#5 Choose whether you want to pay by card or BLIK, then activate your number.

And that's it – enjoy and invite your friends!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
ECO GB: Welcome back!

And what a comeback it is. Let’s start the second season!

Here’s a little sneak peak:
- Polish, beautiful, green and old-enough forests to protect
- A bunch of creatures hidden in the woods - you might recognize them
- Each 90 GB protects 1 m2 of forest, at least with 60 years old!

So what - are we there together again?

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Flex bugs:
Dot Ant – a small insect, feeds only on texts, eats dots, makes typos.
Imruvmentum Insecta – slows down the application performance.
Fog Lady – attacks screens, affects readability and accessibility.
Naturally, all bugs were invited to leave. The newest update is here!

EASY. You sign up. You transfer your number or get a new one. You install an eSIM or order a traditional SIM card. All in the app, without calling or leaving your home.
LOTS OF EVERYTHING. You get unlimited calls, SMS and MMS in Poland and in the EU. You choose how much data you need per month. Plus you get Social Pass, so you can scroll through TikTok, Instagram and other social media and use messaging apps like WhatsApp and Messenger without using up data from the Plan.
AND MORE. Still not enough? In Orange Flex, you can increase your data limit. All you have to do is activate our UNLMTD offer – unlimited data packages for 7 or 30 days. Perfect for digital ninjas who can't live without the internet.
Oh, and you can choose 1, 2 or 3 additional SIM cards or eSIMs for free with your Plan. We figured that it's nice to have for a smartwatch, tablet or second phone. But with UNLMTD you can get unlimited internet at home, for a life free of cables and long contracts.
FLEXIBLE. You can upgrade, downgrade, activate and deactivate your monthly Plan whenever you want and with no extra charge. You can set everything up once and subscribe that way, or change your mind every month. Finally, a mobile offer that keeps up with the changes in your life.
FREEDOM. In Orange Flex, there are no long-term contracts, paperwork, trips to the store or other unnecessary formalities. Who would want to play that game now we've invented the subscription?
SOCIAL. An in-app mobile network offers lots of opportunities – and we didn't hesitate to use them! That's how we came up with one of our users' favourite services: data transfer. You can either send some much-needed internet to friends who are also in Flex, or accept some as a gift from them.
EVERYTHING UNDER CONTROL. Link your card and forget about transfers and top-ups once and for all. You can also pay with BLIK. You decide what packages to buy and when, and you can track your data usage any time in the app. No more high bills after holidays.
FAST AND 5G. You get 5G in all of the Plans on Orange Flex. Plus you can choose an eSIM so you don't have to wait for the courier or mess around with inserting the card into the device. You join the network digitally and eSIM activation takes seconds. If your smartphone supports eSIM, hop on over to Flex – we have the easiest activation (but you're more than welcome to join us with a regular SIM too).
24/7 SUPPORT. The Flex app is super easy and intuitive. But if you need some help, our chat is always available. It's open 24 hours a day.
THERE'S MORE?
There sure is! The core elements of the Orange Flex mobile offer are just the start of the fun. Once you've joined the Flex community, you can:
- buy smartphones, smartwatches and other devices in the Flex Store – we have regular promos here, sometimes really huge ones,
- enjoy discounts in the Flex Club,
- get paid for recommending Flex to friends.

Last but not least – Orange Flex is the first climate-neutral telecom service in Poland. It's powered by green wind energy, and we've gone paperless and cut down on plastic. And every once in a while, we plant forests with our users!

5 STEPS AND YOU'RE ON FLEX:
#1 Download the app and choose your Plan.
#2 Create an account and transfer your number or choose a new one.
#3 Choose an e-SIM or a SIM card (with collection in store or courier delivery).
#4 Confirm your identity – with a selfie and a photo of your ID document or the My ID option via your bank. P.S. We don't store your photos.
#5 Choose whether you want to pay by card or BLIK, then activate your number.

And that's it – enjoy and invite your friends!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Flex bugs:
Dot Ant – a small insect, feeds only on texts, eats dots, makes typos.
Imruvmentum Insecta – slows down the application performance.
Fog Lady – attacks screens, affects readability and accessibility.

Naturally, all bugs were invited to leave. The newest update is here!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Minor bug fixes…?
Not this time! From now on, each Flex user has their own GB Safe in the Flex app!

How does it work?

- All unused GB will be placed in a Data Box in your Data Safe.
- We will do it for you, you don't have to do anything.
- You can withdraw data if needed.

FAST AND 5G. You get 5G in all of the Plans on Orange Flex. Plus you can choose an eSIM so you don't have to wait for the courier or mess around with inserting the card into the device. You join the network digitally and eSIM activation takes seconds. If your smartphone supports eSIM, hop on over to Flex – we have the easiest activation (but you're more than welcome to join us with a regular SIM too).
24/7 SUPPORT. The Flex app is super easy and intuitive. But if you need some help, our chat is always available. It's open 24 hours a day.
THERE'S MORE?
There sure is! The core elements of the Orange Flex mobile offer are just the start of the fun. Once you've joined the Flex community, you can:
- buy smartphones, smartwatches and other devices in the Flex Store – we have regular promos here, sometimes really huge ones,
- enjoy discounts in the Flex Club,
- get paid for recommending Flex to friends.

Last but not least – Orange Flex is the first climate-neutral telecom service in Poland. It's powered by green wind energy, and we've gone paperless and cut down on plastic. And every once in a while, we plant forests with our users!

5 STEPS AND YOU'RE ON FLEX:
#1 Download the app and choose your Plan.
#2 Create an account and transfer your number or choose a new one.
#3 Choose an e-SIM or a SIM card (with collection in store or courier delivery).
#4 Confirm your identity – with a selfie and a photo of your ID document or the My ID option via your bank. P.S. We don't store your photos.
#5 Choose whether you want to pay by card or BLIK, then activate your number.

And that's it – enjoy and invite your friends!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Title: Bug fixing

Big mistakes, big trouble.
Small mistakes... big trouble.
We've already taken care of them, so as not to bother you.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Attention, important news - we decided not to include some of the current imperfections of the app for the May city break. It's lighter, (this time) we will avoid excess baggage... So let’s go!

title:
Orange Flex
62.1.0

creator: Orange Polska
descriptionHtml:
Orange Flex is an in-app mobile offer. More flexible than a standard subscription, easier than a prepaid plan. It's easy to transfer your number and you can change your Plan whenever you need to – even once a month. Forget about long contracts and notice periods! Plus you get data and unlimited calls, 5G and eSIM.

WHY IS IT GREAT TO BE IN ORANGE FLEX?

EASY. You sign up. You transfer your number or get a new one. You install an eSIM or order a SIM card. All in the app, without calling or leaving your home.
LOTS OF EVERYTHING. You get unlimited calls, SMS and MMS in Poland and in the EU. You choose how much data you need per month. Plus you get Social Pass, so you can scroll through the social media and use messaging apps without using up data from the Plan.
AND MORE. Still not enough? In Orange Flex, you can increase your data limit. All you have to do is activate our UNLMTD offer – unlimited data packages for 7 or 30 days. Perfect for digital ninjas who can't live without the internet.
Oh, and you can choose 1, 2 or 3 additional SIM cards or eSIMs for free with your Plan. We figured that it's nice to have for a smartwatch, tablet or second phone. But with UNLMTD you can get unlimited internet at home, for a life free of cables and long contracts.
FLEXIBLE. You can upgrade, downgrade, activate and deactivate your monthly Plan whenever you want and with no extra charge. You can set everything up once or change your mind every month. Unused GBs are stored in the Data Safe so that you don’t lose them!
OR STABLE. If you don't need frequent changes, you choose an annual subscription and pay less.
FREEDOM. In Orange Flex, there are no long-term contracts, paperwork, trips to the store or other formalities. Who would want to play that game now we've invented the subscription?
SOCIAL. An in-app mobile network offers lots of opportunities – and we didn't hesitate to use them! That's how we came up with one of our users' favourite services: data transfer. You can either send some much-needed internet to friends who are also in Flex, or accept some as a gift from them.
EVERYTHING UNDER CONTROL. Link your card and forget about transfers and top-ups once and for all. You can also pay with BLIK. You decide what packages to buy and when, and you can track your data usage any time in the app. No more high bills after holidays.
FAST AND 5G. You get 5G in all of the Plans on Orange Flex. Plus you can choose an eSIM so you don't have to wait for the courier or mess around with inserting the card into the device. You join the network digitally and eSIM activation takes seconds. If your smartphone supports eSIM, hop on over to Flex – we have the easiest activation (but you can join us with a regular SIM too).
24/7 SUPPORT. The Flex app is super easy and intuitive. But if you need some help, our chat is always available. It's open 24 hours a day.

THERE'S MORE?

There sure is! The core elements of the Orange Flex mobile offer are just the start of the fun. Once you've joined the Flex community, you can:
- buy smartphones, smartwatches and other devices in the Flex Store – we have regular promos here, sometimes really huge ones,
- enjoy discounts in the Flex Club,
- get paid for recommending Flex to friends.

Last but not least – Orange Flex is the first climate-neutral telecom service in Poland. It's powered by green wind energy, and we've gone paperless and cut down on plastic. And on top of that, we protect the forests with our users!

5 STEPS AND YOU'RE ON FLEX:
#1 Download the app and choose your Plan.
#2 Create an account and transfer your number or choose a new one.
#3 Choose an e-SIM or a SIM card (with collection in store or courier delivery).
#4 Confirm your identity – with a selfie and a photo of your ID document or the My ID option via your bank. P.S. We don't store your photos.
#5 Choose whether you want to pay by card or BLIK, then activate your number.

And that's it – enjoy and invite your friends!
descriptionShort: My network, my app, my way

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixing - season 7, episode 19. Only one spoiler - it got hot (outside the window too?). Update the app and find out what's exciting the Flex society this season.

title:
Orange Flex
62.6.0

creator: Orange Polska
descriptionHtml:
Orange Flex is an in-app mobile offer! More flexible than a standard subscription and easier than a prepaid plan. It's easy to transfer your number and you can change your Plan whenever you need to – even once a month. No blah, blah, contracts or notice period. And on top of that GBs and phone calls without limits, the newest 5G technology and eSIMs. Orange Flex is enough.

WHY IS IT GREAT TO BE IN ORANGE FLEX?

EASY. You sign up, transfer your number or get a new one, and then activate an eSIM or order a traditional SIM card – all in the app, without calling or leaving home.

LOTS OF EVERYTHING. Unlimited phone calls, SMS, MMS in Poland and while roaming in the EU. And a GB package that exactly mee[ts your needs!

EVEN MORE. Still not enough? In Orange Flex, you can increase your GB package. All you have to do is take UNLMTD, which is unlimited internet for 7 or 30 days. This is something especially for digital ninjas, for whom the internet = air.
Oh, and you can also add 1, 2 or 3 SIM cards or eSIMs to your Plan for free. We've got this option because it's nice to have an extra SIM for a second phone, smartwatch or tablet. But UNLMTD also means unlimited internet at home. Live without cables and a long contract!

FLEXIBLE. You can upgrade or downgrade, turn on or off the monthly Plan – as you wish and without additional fees. Set everything once and subscribe like that or change your mind every month. And if you prefer long-term relationships, an annual subscription will be just right. Unused GBs? Keep it in the Data Safe!

CHILL. Orange Flex does not have: long contracts, paperwork, trips to stores and tiresome formalities. Orange Flex has: subscription. So if you like total freedom and your middle name is Nomad, you will be happy with us!

WITH THE OPTION OF SHARING GBS. The mobile offer in the app gives you unlimited possibilities, so in Orange Flex you can transfer unused GBs to your friends. Help another Flex user with the internet and make their day. Or let them help you!

UNDER CONTROL. Link your card and forget about transfers or top-ups once and for all. Do you prefer BLIK? We have that too. Choose Plans tailored to your current needs and track your data usage on an ongoing basis!

ROAMING? ALSO UNDER CONTROL. It's good everywhere, but it's best with Orange Flex. Wherever you are, you can conveniently check your remaining data limit and buy an additional roaming package in the app. Are you travelling outside the EU? Choose cheap Here and There or British Packages and surf the net your way. You pay for the package in advance, and after it is used up, we block data transmission – with Orange Flex you don't have to stress about the post-vacation bill.

FAST AND MODERN. In each Plan you have innovative 5G, which means you work like with cable internet, but without a cable. Choose eSIM, don't wait for delivery and join us digitally in a few seconds. Do you have a regular SIM? Take it easy, we'll take care of it!

24/7 SUPPORT. The Flex app is super simple and intuitive, but if you need help, you always have a 24-hour chat at hand.

SOME COOL EXTRAS?

Ofc! Basic Flex options are just the beginning. After joining us you can:
- buy smartphones, smartwatches and other devices in the Flex Shop – we have regular promos here, sometimes really huge ones,
- enjoy discounts in the Flex Club,
- get paid for recommending Flex to friends.

Last but not least – Orange Flex is the first climate-neutral telecom service in Poland. It's powered by green wind energy, and we've gone paperless and cut down on plastic. And on top of that, we protect the forests with our users!

5 TAPS AND YOU’RE FLEX:
#1 Download the app and choose your Plan.
#2 Create an account and transfer your current number or choose a new one.
#3 Decide: the most convenient e-SIM or SIM with collection in store or in parcel locker.
#4 Use a selfie and a photo of your ID or My ID to confirm that it's you.
#5 Card or BLIK, and then just activate your number.
descriptionShort: Subscription mobile offer with 5G, eSIM, lots of GBs and unlimited calls

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Between another performances of "Ba-dee-ya, say, do you remember? Ba-dee-ya, dancin' in September" we've refreshed the app with small bug fixing. Update it and check it out! PS Yes, we are autumn lovers…

Oh, and you can also add 1, 2 or 3 SIM cards or eSIMs to your Plan for free. We've got this option because it's nice to have an extra SIM for a second phone, smartwatch or tablet. But UNLMTD also means unlimited internet at home. Live without cables and a long contract!

FLEXIBLE. You can upgrade or downgrade, turn on or off the monthly Plan – as you wish and without additional fees. Set everything once and subscribe like that or change your mind every month. And if you prefer long-term relationships, an annual subscription will be just right. Unused GBs? Keep it in the Data Safe!

CHILL. Orange Flex does not have: long contracts, paperwork, trips to stores and tiresome formalities. Orange Flex has: subscription. So if you like total freedom and your middle name is Nomad, you will be happy with us!

WITH THE OPTION OF SHARING GBS. The mobile offer in the app gives you unlimited possibilities, so in Orange Flex you can transfer unused GBs to your friends. Help another Flex user with the internet and make their day. Or let them help you!

UNDER CONTROL. Link your card and forget about transfers or top-ups once and for all. Do you prefer BLIK? We have that too. Choose Plans tailored to your current needs and track your data usage on an ongoing basis!

ROAMING? ALSO UNDER CONTROL. It's good everywhere, but it's best with Orange Flex. Wherever you are, you can conveniently check your remaining data limit and buy an additional roaming package in the app. Are you travelling outside the EU? Choose cheap Here and There or British Packages and surf the net your way. You pay for the package in advance, and after it is used up, we block data transmission – with Orange Flex you don't have to stress about the post-vacation bill.

FAST AND MODERN. In each Plan you have innovative 5G, which means you work like with cable internet, but without a cable. Choose eSIM, don't wait for delivery and join us digitally in a few seconds. Do you have a regular SIM? Take it easy, we'll take care of it!

24/7 SUPPORT. The Flex app is super simple and intuitive, but if you need help, you always have a 24-hour chat at hand.

SOME COOL EXTRAS?

Ofc! Basic Flex options are just the beginning. After joining us you can:
- buy smartphones, smartwatches and other devices in the Flex Shop – we have regular promos here, sometimes really huge ones,
- enjoy discounts in the Flex Club,
- get paid for recommending Flex to friends.

Last but not least – Orange Flex is the first climate-neutral telecom service in Poland. It's powered by green wind energy, and we've gone paperless and cut down on plastic. And on top of that, we protect the forests with our users!

5 TAPS AND YOU’RE FLEX:
#1 Download the app and choose your Plan.
#2 Create an account and transfer your current number or choose a new one.
#3 Decide: the most convenient e-SIM or SIM with collection in store or in parcel locker.
#4 Use a selfie and a photo of your ID or My ID to confirm that it's you.
#5 Card or BLIK, and then just activate your number.
descriptionShort: Subscription mobile offer with 5G, eSIM, lots of GBs and unlimited calls

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Pure concrete: another spring bug fixing in the app is behind us. It shines and smells so good that you want to click! PS Okay, okay, we'll wash the windows next time…
